name: LIMITED EDITION Pastel Aztec Clutch
description:
Handmade using re-purposed vintage fabric, upcycled lining and hand-fringed leather, this eco-friendly clutch in it's pretty pastel hues is perfect for the girly gypsy. Just the right size to carry your iPad and/or a real live book, alongside all the bits and bobs us girls so love to carry. 

10% of every sale will be invested into a Kiva.org entrepreneur at the end of each season. Read more about it in our Green Policy above.

Width: 11.8” 
Size: ONE SIZE
Fabric: Re-purposed Vintage outer, Upcycled lining
Leather: Hand-fringed Deadstock
Felt: Eco-Fi Kunin
Made In: England 
Care: Spot Wash 
Brand: Leotie Lovely
Limited Edition: 44-Of-A-Kind

name: THREE-OF-A-KIND VINTAGE Elephant Clutch
description:
Handmade using upcycled vintage fabric, upcycled lining and embellished with hand beaded repurposed beads, this eco-friendly clutch brings a bit of rock n' roll to the collection. One black and two white available. Then they're gone baby, gone.

All of the profits from sales of these clutches will be donated to WWF's efforts in conserving African elephants by protecting their habitat and improving connections between fragmented areas of habitat that they inhabit.
